summary:
Despite being toted as some long-lost and powerful artifact, the Ancient Shrouded set is kind of... meh... 
But more importantly, it looks just like the standard shrouded set. The aim of this mod is to give the Ancient Shrouded armor an old and powerful look, while remaining lore-friendly and practical. 
The stats are unchanged from the original
descriptionHtml:
Despite being toted as some long-lost and powerful artifact, the Ancient Shrouded set is kind of... meh... 
But more importantly, it looks just like the standard shrouded set. The aim of this mod is to give the Ancient Shrouded armor an old and powerful look, while remaining lore-friendly and practical. 
The stats are unchanged from the original game, all this does is make the armor look like it\'s own set, rather than a slightly altered version of the standard (think Guild Master armor compared to standard Thieves Guild set.)
author: rylog9

files.name: Unique Ancient Shrouded Armor
files.changelogHtml: Initial upload. Need to fix invisibility bug on boots
